Html:
Dear.

I had experience incorrect coogle routing after update to newest source code from CodePlex. So, I tried to find a cause and as result, GoogleMapProvider.DecodePointsInto() method causes an issue and old codes before 'changeset d93adf855fc4 (March 24)' works fine.

Please check it on your free time.
Thanks.
can you send your request parameters?

You can confirm it on the Demo app. You can watch a screenshot on the http://postimg.org/image/4ekv7p8nj/

On the screenshot, End location is the Lat=33.8155, Lng=-118.3145 but routing path drew to wrong direction.

I have the same issue. Here is the url:

http://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/directions/xml?origin=-8.0646854,-34.9374402&destination=-8.0525464,-34.8716278&sensor=false&language=en&units=metric&mode=driving

If i decode the points with the current DecodePointsInto method it returns something like epician's post. The path end point is different from the requested endpoint.
